The YouTube video uploaded on March 17: 2021, titled "Biden Fakes Interview, Green Screen Fails" and viewed over 500,000 times, claimed that Biden faked an interaction with reporters.
Some viewers interpreted the video as pr: as one of Biden's hands appeared to go through a microphone.
Speculation about the faked interaction: with one user claiming that Biden was standing in front of a green screen.
However: the authenticity of the claim was verified by multiple sources, including Steve Herman, the White House correspondent for Voice of America, who confirmed that he was the one holding the microphone that Biden's hand appeared to go through. Other media organizations also reported on the brief exchange between Biden and reporters on the White House lawn.
